author: spencer_tb
content:
The stable version should contain test fixtures for all forks up to Cancun, configured for all forks (up to Cancun)! For example: tests for Frontier configured only for Frontier, then all the Frontier & Homestead tests configured for Homestead..., up to the tests for all stable forks configured for Cancun! We'll aim to move Prague into stable after the hardfork üòÑ

I just tried pulling in stable and don't see Prague within it. Could you confirm that we have the same root hash within `v4.0.0/fixtures_stable/fixtures/.meta/index.json`:
`0x969978e723a535333846fa0abeab3e9e96d7e0c21b6911e184015eb8de1271d`

author: gumb00
content: still not sure how that skip flag works

author: spencer_tb
content: It looks like it is only skipped for the `execute` command and not `fill` so it would show up in releases for this reason

author: dimitry8570
content: Pyspecs uses eels classes to calculate state root hash so it doesn't require a t8n call for that
